36/**
37 * Sanitize sensitive data for logging
38 *
39 * Recursively sanitizes array data to prevent sensitive information
40 * like passwords and usernames from appearing in logs.
41 *
42 * @since 1.0.0
43 * @param mixed $data The data to sanitize
44 * @return mixed Sanitized data with sensitive fields redacted
45 */
46function shift8_gravitysap_sanitize_log_data($data) {
47    if (is_array($data)) {
48        $sanitized = array();
49        foreach ($data as $key => $value) {
50            $key_lower = strtolower($key);
51            if (in_array($key_lower, array('password', 'sap_password', 'pass', 'pwd'), true)) {
52                $sanitized[$key] = '***REDACTED***';
53            } elseif (in_array($key_lower, array('username', 'sap_username', 'user', 'login'), true)) {
54                $sanitized[$key] = strlen($value) > 2 ? substr($value, 0, 2) . '***' : '***';
55            } elseif (is_array($value)) {
56                $sanitized[$key] = shift8_gravitysap_sanitize_log_data($value);
57            } else {
58                $sanitized[$key] = $value;
59            }
60        }
61        return $sanitized;
62    }
63    return $data;
64}

66/**
67 * Global debug logging function
68 *
69 * Uses WordPress default error_log() for security. Requires both WP_DEBUG
70 * and user setting to be enabled. Automatically sanitizes sensitive data
71 * to prevent credential exposure.
72 *
73 * @since 1.0.0
74 * @param string $message The log message
75 * @param mixed  $data    Optional data to include in the log
76 */
77function shift8_gravitysap_debug_log($message, $data = null) {
78    // SECURITY: Require WP_DEBUG to be enabled
79    if (!defined('WP_DEBUG') || !WP_DEBUG) {
80        return;
81    }
82    
83    // Check if user has enabled debug logging in plugin settings
84    $settings = get_option('shift8_gravitysap_settings', array());
85    if (!isset($settings['sap_debug']) || $settings['sap_debug'] !== '1') {
86        return;
87    }
88    
89    // Sanitize sensitive data from logs
90    if ($data !== null) {
91        $data = shift8_gravitysap_sanitize_log_data($data);
92    }
93
94    // Format the log message
95    $log_message = '[Shift8 GravitySAP] ' . $message;
96    if ($data !== null) {
97        $log_message .= ' - Data: ' . wp_json_encode($data);
98    }
99
100    // Use WordPress default error_log() - logs to debug.log if WP_DEBUG_LOG is enabled
101    if (defined('WP_DEBUG_LOG') && WP_DEBUG_LOG) {
102        error_log($log_message);
103    }
104}

106/**
107 * Encrypt password for storage
108 *
109 * @since 1.0.0
110 * @param string $password The password to encrypt
111 * @return string The encrypted password
112 */
113function shift8_gravitysap_encrypt_password($password) {
114    if (empty($password)) {
115        return '';
116    }
117    
118    // Use WordPress salts for encryption key
119    $key = wp_salt('auth');
120    $iv = openssl_random_pseudo_bytes(16);
121    $encrypted = openssl_encrypt($password, 'AES-256-CBC', $key, 0, $iv);
122    
123    return base64_encode($iv . $encrypted);
124}
125
126/**
127 * Decrypt password from storage
128 *
129 * @since 1.0.0
130 * @param string $encrypted_password The encrypted password
131 * @return string The decrypted password
132 */
133function shift8_gravitysap_decrypt_password($encrypted_password) {
134    if (empty($encrypted_password)) {
135        return '';
136    }
137    
138    $key = wp_salt('auth');
139    $data = base64_decode($encrypted_password);
140    $iv = substr($data, 0, 16);
141    $encrypted = substr($data, 16);
142    
143    return openssl_decrypt($encrypted, 'AES-256-CBC', $key, 0, $iv);
144}

146/**
147 * Filter SSL verification setting
148 *
149 * @since 1.2.1
150 */
151add_filter('shift8_gravitysap_sslverify', function($verify) {
152    $settings = get_option('shift8_gravitysap_settings', array());
153    // Return user's setting, default to false (disabled) if not set for backwards compatibility
154    return isset($settings['sap_ssl_verify']) && $settings['sap_ssl_verify'] === '1';
155});

162        echo '</p></div>';
163    });
164    return;

169/**
170 * Main plugin class
171 *
172 * Handles plugin initialization, Gravity Forms integration,
173 * and SAP Business One communication.
174 *
175 * @since 1.0.0
176 */
177class Shift8_GravitySAP {
178    
179    /**
180     * Plugin instance
181     *
182     * @since 1.0.0
183     * @var Shift8_GravitySAP|null
184     */
185    private static $instance = null;
186    
187    /**
188     * Get plugin instance (Singleton pattern)
189     *
190     * @since 1.0.0
191     * @return Shift8_GravitySAP
192     */
193    public static function get_instance() {
194        if (null === self::$instance) {
195            self::$instance = new self();
196        }
197        return self::$instance;
198    }
199    
200    /**
201     * Constructor
202     *
203     * Sets up plugin hooks and initialization.
204     *
205     * @since 1.0.0
206     */
207    private function __construct() {
208        add_action('plugins_loaded', array($this, 'init'));
209        register_activation_hook(__FILE__, array($this, 'activate'));
210        register_deactivation_hook(__FILE__, array($this, 'deactivate'));
211        
212        // Form processing hooks
213        add_action('gform_after_submission', array($this, 'process_form_submission'), 10, 2);
214        
215        // Add SAP B1 status column to entries list
216        add_filter('gform_entry_list_columns', array($this, 'add_sap_status_column'), 10, 2);
217        add_filter('gform_entries_field_value', array($this, 'display_sap_status_column'), 10, 4);
218        add_filter('gform_get_entries', array($this, 'load_sap_entry_meta'), 10, 2);
219        
220        // Add retry functionality for failed submissions
221        add_action('wp_ajax_retry_sap_submission', array($this, 'ajax_retry_sap_submission'));
222        add_action('wp_ajax_load_itemcodes', array($this, 'ajax_load_itemcodes'));
223        add_action('admin_footer', array($this, 'add_retry_button_script'));
224        
225        
226        // Form validation hook for SAP field limits
227        add_filter('gform_validation', array($this, 'validate_sap_field_limits'), 20); // Run after other validation
228    }
229    
230    /**
231     * Initialize plugin
232     *
233     * Loads textdomain, checks dependencies, and sets up integrations.
234     *
235     * @since 1.0.0
236     */
237    public function init() {
238        shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Plugin init() called');
239        
240        // WordPress automatically loads translations for plugins hosted on WordPress.org since version 4.6
241        
242        // Initialize admin functionality
243        if (is_admin()) {
244            $this->init_admin();
245        }
246        
247        // Check if Gravity Forms is active
248        $gf_active = $this->is_gravity_forms_active();
249        shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Gravity Forms active check', array(
250            'gf_active' => $gf_active ? 'true' : 'false',
251            'GFForms_exists' => class_exists('GFForms') ? 'true' : 'false'
252        ));
253        
254        // Initialize Gravity Forms integration
255        if ($gf_active) {
256            add_action('init', array($this, 'init_gravity_forms_integration'), 15);
257        } else {
258            add_action('admin_notices', array($this, 'gravity_forms_missing_notice'));
259        }
260    }
261    
262    /**
263     * Check if Gravity Forms is active
264     *
265     * @since 1.0.0
266     * @return bool True if Gravity Forms is active, false otherwise
267     */
268    private function is_gravity_forms_active() {
269        if (!function_exists('is_plugin_active')) {
270            include_once(ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/plugin.php');
271        }
272        
273        return is_plugin_active('gravityforms/gravityforms.php') || class_exists('GFForms');
274    }
275    
276    /**
277     * Initialize Gravity Forms integration
278     *
279     * Sets up form settings, submission processing, and related hooks.
280     *
281     * @since 1.0.0
282     */
283    public function init_gravity_forms_integration() {
284        if (!class_exists('GFForms')) {
285            return;
286        }
287        
288        // Add form settings tab
289        add_filter('gform_form_settings_menu', array($this, 'add_form_settings_menu'), 10, 2);
290        
291        // Handle settings page  
292        add_action('gform_form_settings_page_sap_integration', array($this, 'form_settings_page'));
293        
294        // Save form settings
295        add_filter('gform_pre_form_settings_save', array($this, 'save_form_settings'));
296        
297        // Process form submissions
298        // add_action('gform_after_submission', array($this, 'process_form_submission'), 10, 2); // Moved to constructor
299    }

301    /**
302     * Initialize admin functionality
303     *
304     * @since 1.0.0
305     */
306    public function init_admin() {
307        require_once SHIFT8_GRAVITYSAP_PLUGIN_DIR . 'admin/class-shift8-gravitysap-admin.php';
308        new Shift8_GravitySAP_Admin();
309    }

313     *
314     * @since 1.0.0
315     */
316    public function gravity_forms_missing_notice() {
317        echo '<div class="notice notice-error"><p>';
318                    echo esc_html__('Shift8 Integration for Gravity Forms and SAP Business One requires Gravity Forms to be installed and activated.', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration');
319        echo '</p></div>';
320    }

322    /**
323     * Plugin activation
324     *
325     * Sets up default options and performs initial setup.
326     *
327     * @since 1.0.0
328     */
329    public function activate() {
330        // Set default options if they don't exist
331        if (!get_option('shift8_gravitysap_settings')) {
332            add_option('shift8_gravitysap_settings', array(
333                'sap_endpoint' => '',
334                'sap_company_db' => '',
335                'sap_username' => '',
336                'sap_password' => '',
337                'sap_debug' => '0'
338            ));
339        }
340        
341        // Create uploads directory for logs if it doesn't exist
342        $upload_dir = wp_upload_dir();
343        if (!is_dir($upload_dir['basedir'])) {
344            wp_mkdir_p($upload_dir['basedir']);
345        }
346        
347        shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Plugin activated');
348    }

350    /**
351     * Add SAP Integration tab to form settings
352     *
353     * @since 1.0.0
354     * @param array $menu_items Current menu items
355     * @param int   $form_id    Form ID
356     * @return array Modified menu items
357     */
358    public function add_form_settings_menu($menu_items, $form_id) {
359        $menu_items[] = array(
360            'name' => 'sap_integration',
361            'label' => esc_html__('SAP Integration', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'),
362            'icon' => 'dashicons-admin-links dashicons' // Alternatives: dashicons-database, dashicons-cloud, dashicons-networking, dashicons-plugins-checked
363        );
364        return $menu_items;
365    }
366
367    /**
368     * Display the form settings page
369     *
370     * Renders the SAP integration configuration interface for individual forms.
371     *
372     * @since 1.0.0
373     */
374    public function form_settings_page() {
375        // Verify user capabilities - use Gravity Forms capability
376        if (!GFCommon::current_user_can_any('gravityforms_edit_forms')) {
377            wp_die(esc_html__('You do not have sufficient permissions to access this page.', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'));
378        }
379        
380        $form_id = absint(rgget('id'));
381        if (!$form_id) {
382            wp_die(esc_html__('Invalid form ID.', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'));
383        }
384        
385        $form = GFAPI::get_form($form_id);
386        if (!$form) {
387            wp_die(esc_html__('Form not found.', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'));
388        }
389        
390        // Handle form submissions with proper nonce verification
391        if (rgpost('gform-settings-save') && wp_verify_nonce(rgpost('gforms_save_form'), 'gforms_save_form')) {
392            $form = $this->save_form_settings($form);
393            GFAPI::update_form($form);
394            $form = GFAPI::get_form($form_id); // Reload fresh data
395            GFCommon::add_message(esc_html__('SAP Integration settings saved successfully!', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'));
396        }
397        
398        // Handle test integration with proper nonce verification
399        if (rgpost('test-sap-integration') && wp_verify_nonce(rgpost('gforms_save_form'), 'gforms_save_form')) {
400            $test_result = $this->test_sap_integration($form);
401            
402            if ($test_result['success']) {
403                GFCommon::add_message(esc_html__('Test successful! Business Partner created in SAP: ', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration') . esc_html($test_result['message']));
404            } else {
405                GFCommon::add_error_message(esc_html__('Test failed: ', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration') . esc_html($test_result['message']));
406            }
407        }
408        
409        // Handle field mapping test
410        if (rgpost('test-field-mapping') && wp_verify_nonce(rgpost('gforms_save_form'), 'gforms_save_form')) {
411            $test_result = $this->test_field_mapping($form);
412            
413            if ($test_result['success']) {
414                GFCommon::add_message(esc_html__('Field mapping test completed: ', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration') . esc_html($test_result['message']));
415            } else {
416                GFCommon::add_error_message(esc_html__('Field mapping test failed: ', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration') . esc_html($test_result['message']));
417            }
418        }
419        
420        // Handle debug entry data
421        if (rgpost('debug-entry-data') && wp_verify_nonce(rgpost('gforms_save_form'), 'gforms_save_form')) {
422            $debug_result = $this->debug_entry_data($form);
423            GFCommon::add_message('<pre>' . esc_html($debug_result) . '</pre>');
424        }
425        
426        // Handle test SAP submission
427        if (rgpost('test-sap-submission') && wp_verify_nonce(rgpost('gforms_save_form'), 'gforms_save_form')) {
428            $test_result = $this->test_sap_submission($form);
429            if ($test_result['success']) {
430                GFCommon::add_message('✅ SAP submission test successful: ' . esc_html($test_result['message']));
431            } else {
432                GFCommon::add_error_message('❌ SAP submission test failed: ' . esc_html($test_result['message']));
433            }
434        }
435        
436        // Handle numbering series test with proper nonce verification
437        if (rgpost('test-numbering-series') && wp_verify_nonce(rgpost('gforms_save_form'), 'gforms_save_form')) {
438            $test_result = $this->test_numbering_series();
439            
440            if ($test_result['success']) {
441                GFCommon::add_message(esc_html__('Numbering series check successful: ', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration') . esc_html($test_result['message']));
442            } else {
443                GFCommon::add_error_message(esc_html__('Numbering series check failed: ', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration') . esc_html($test_result['message']));
444            }
445        }
446        
447        // Get current settings
448        $settings = rgar($form, 'sap_integration_settings', array());
449        
450        // Render page
451        $this->render_form_settings_page($form_id, $form, $settings);
452    }
453

826    
827    /**
828     * Get available SAP ItemCodes for quotation mapping
829     *
830     * @since 1.2.2
831     * @return array Array of ItemCode => ItemName pairs
832     */
833    private function get_sap_item_codes() {
834        // Check for manual refresh request
835        $force_refresh = isset($_GET['refresh_itemcodes']) && $_GET['refresh_itemcodes'] === '1';
836        
837        // Get persistent ItemCode storage
838        $option_key = 'shift8_gravitysap_item_codes_data';
839        $stored_data = get_option($option_key, array());
840        
841        // Check if we have valid cached ItemCodes (unless forcing refresh)
842        if (!$force_refresh && !empty($stored_data['items']) && is_array($stored_data['items'])) {
843            return $stored_data['items'];
844        }
845        
846        try {
847            // Get SAP settings
848            $sap_settings = get_option('shift8_gravitysap_settings', array());
849            
850            if (empty($sap_settings['sap_endpoint']) || empty($sap_settings['sap_company_db'])) {
851                return !empty($stored_data['items']) ? $stored_data['items'] : array();
852            }
853            
854            // Decrypt password
855            $sap_settings['sap_password'] = shift8_gravitysap_decrypt_password($sap_settings['sap_password']);
856            
857            // Create SAP service
858            require_once SHIFT8_GRAVITYSAP_PLUGIN_DIR . 'includes/class-shift8-gravitysap-sap-service.php';
859            $sap_service = new Shift8_GravitySAP_SAP_Service($sap_settings);
860            
861            // CRITICAL: Ensure authentication before making request
862            $reflection = new ReflectionClass($sap_service);
863            $auth_method = $reflection->getMethod('ensure_authenticated');
864            $auth_method->setAccessible(true);
865            
866            if (!$auth_method->invoke($sap_service)) {
867                if (defined('WP_DEBUG') && WP_DEBUG) {
868                    shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('ItemCode loading failed: Authentication failed');
869                }
870                // Return existing cached data if authentication fails
871                return !empty($stored_data['items']) ? $stored_data['items'] : array();
872            }
873            
874            // Use reflection to access private make_request method
875            $method = $reflection->getMethod('make_request');
876            $method->setAccessible(true);
877            
878            // Query for items (limit to 100 for performance, only active items)
879            $response = $method->invoke($sap_service, 'GET', '/Items?$top=100&$select=ItemCode,ItemName&$filter=Valid eq \'Y\'&$orderby=ItemCode');
880            
881            if (is_wp_error($response)) {
882                // Return existing cached data if request fails
883                return !empty($stored_data['items']) ? $stored_data['items'] : array();
884            }
885            
886            $response_code = wp_remote_retrieve_response_code($response);
887            if ($response_code !== 200) {
888                // Return existing cached data if request fails
889                return !empty($stored_data['items']) ? $stored_data['items'] : array();
890            }
891            
892            $body = wp_remote_retrieve_body($response);
893            $data = json_decode($body, true);
894            
895            if (!isset($data['value']) || !is_array($data['value'])) {
896                // Return existing cached data if response is invalid
897                return !empty($stored_data['items']) ? $stored_data['items'] : array();
898            }
899            
900            $items = array();
901            foreach ($data['value'] as $item) {
902                if (!empty($item['ItemCode'])) {
903                    $items[$item['ItemCode']] = $item['ItemName'] ?? $item['ItemCode'];
904                }
905            }
906            
907            // Store persistently with metadata
908            $new_data = array(
909                'items' => $items,
910                'last_updated' => current_time('timestamp'),
911                'last_updated_formatted' => current_time('mysql'),
912                'count' => count($items),
913                'source' => 'sap_api'
914            );
915            
916            update_option($option_key, $new_data);
917            
918            // Log success for debugging
919            if (defined('WP_DEBUG') && WP_DEBUG) {
920                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('ItemCodes loaded and stored persistently', array(
921                    'count' => count($items),
922                    'force_refresh' => $force_refresh,
923                    'storage' => 'wp_options',
924                    'sample_items' => array_slice($items, 0, 3, true) // First 3 items for debugging
925                ));
926            }
927            
928            return $items;
929            
930        } catch (Exception $e) {
931            if (defined('WP_DEBUG') && WP_DEBUG) {
932                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('ItemCode loading exception', array(
933                    'error' => $e->getMessage(),
934                    'returning_cached' => !empty($stored_data['items'])
935                ));
936            }
937            
938            // Return existing cached data if exception occurs
939            return !empty($stored_data['items']) ? $stored_data['items'] : array();
940        }
941    }
942
943    /**
944     * Render field mapping table
945     *

976                            <?php if (isset($sap_limits[$sap_field]['required']) && $sap_limits[$sap_field]['required']): ?>
977                                <span style="color: red;">*</span>
978                            <?php endif; ?>
979                        </td>

982                                <option value=""><?php esc_html_e('Select a field', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'); ?></option>
983                                <?php
984                                foreach ($form['fields'] as $field) {
985                                    // Include more field types for better mapping coverage
986                                    $allowed_types = array(
987                                        'text', 'email', 'phone', 'address', 'name', 'hidden', 'website',

990                                        'post_excerpt', 'post_tags', 'post_category', 'post_image', 'post_custom_field'
991                                    );
992                                    
993                                    if (in_array($field->type, $allowed_types, true)) {
994                                        $field_mapping = rgar($settings, 'field_mapping');
995                                        $selected = selected(rgar($field_mapping, $sap_field), $field->id, false);
996                                        echo '<option value="' . esc_attr($field->id) . '" ' . esc_attr($selected) . '>' . esc_html(GFCommon::get_label($field)) . '</option>';
997                                    }
998                                }
999                                ?>
1000                            </select>
1001                        </td>
1002                        <td>
1003                            <?php if (isset($sap_limits[$sap_field])): ?>
1004                                <small style="color: #666;">
1005                                    Max: <?php echo esc_html($sap_limits[$sap_field]['max_length']); ?> chars
1006                                    <?php if (isset($sap_limits[$sap_field]['validation_message'])): ?>
1007                                        <br><em><?php echo esc_html($sap_limits[$sap_field]['validation_message']); ?></em>
1008                                    <?php endif; ?>
1009                                </small>
1010                            <?php endif; ?>
1011                        </td>
1012                    </tr>
1013                <?php endforeach; ?>
1014            </tbody>
1015        </table>
1016        <p class="description">
1017            <span style="color: red;">*</span> <?php esc_html_e('Required fields', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'); ?>
1018            <br><?php esc_html_e('Form validation will automatically check these SAP field limits before submission.', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'); ?>
1019        </p>
1020        <?php
1021    }

1033        ?>

1429    /**
1430     * Save form settings
1431     *
1432     * Validates and sanitizes form settings before saving.
1433     *
1434     * @since 1.0.0
1435     * @param array $form Form data
1436     * @return array Modified form data
1437     */
1438    public function save_form_settings($form) {
1439        // Only process our settings when we're on our subview
1440        if (rgget('subview') !== 'sap_integration') {
1441            return $form;
1442        }
1443        
1444        // Verify nonce
1445        if (!wp_verify_nonce(rgpost('gforms_save_form'), 'gforms_save_form')) {
1446            return $form;
1447        }
1448        
1449        // Sanitize and validate settings
1450        $settings = array(
1451            'enabled' => rgpost('sap_enabled') === '1' ? '1' : '0',
1452            'feed_name' => sanitize_text_field(rgpost('sap_feed_name')),
1453            'card_type' => in_array(rgpost('sap_card_type'), array('cCustomer', 'cSupplier', 'cLid'), true) ? rgpost('sap_card_type') : 'cCustomer',
1454            'card_code_prefix' => sanitize_text_field(rgpost('sap_card_code_prefix')),
1455            'create_quotation' => rgpost('sap_create_quotation') === '1' ? '1' : '0',
1456            'field_mapping' => array(),
1457            'quotation_field_mapping' => array()
1458        );
1459        
1460        // Validate and sanitize Business Partner field mapping
1461        $field_mapping = rgpost('sap_field_mapping');
1462        if (is_array($field_mapping)) {
1463            $allowed_sap_fields = $this->get_allowed_sap_fields();
1464            
1465            foreach ($field_mapping as $sap_field => $field_id) {
1466                if (in_array($sap_field, $allowed_sap_fields, true) && is_numeric($field_id) && $field_id > 0) {
1467                    $settings['field_mapping'][$sap_field] = absint($field_id);
1468                }
1469            }
1470        }
1471        
1472        // Validate and sanitize Sales Quotation field mapping
1473        $quotation_mapping = rgpost('sap_quotation_field_mapping');
1474        if (is_array($quotation_mapping)) {
1475            $allowed_quotation_fields = array_keys($this->get_sap_quotation_fields());
1476            
1477            foreach ($quotation_mapping as $quotation_field => $field_id) {
1478                if (in_array($quotation_field, $allowed_quotation_fields, true) && is_numeric($field_id) && $field_id > 0) {
1479                    $settings['quotation_field_mapping'][$quotation_field] = absint($field_id);
1480                }
1481            }
1482        }
1483        
1484        // Validate and sanitize Sales Quotation ItemCode mapping
1485        $quotation_itemcode_mapping = rgpost('sap_quotation_itemcode_mapping');
1486        if (is_array($quotation_itemcode_mapping)) {
1487            $settings['quotation_itemcode_mapping'] = array();
1488            $allowed_quotation_fields = array_keys($this->get_sap_quotation_fields());
1489            
1490            foreach ($quotation_itemcode_mapping as $quotation_field => $item_code) {
1491                if (in_array($quotation_field, $allowed_quotation_fields, true) && !empty($item_code)) {
1492                    $settings['quotation_itemcode_mapping'][$quotation_field] = sanitize_text_field($item_code);
1493                }
1494            }
1495        }
1496        
1497        // Validate and sanitize Sales Quotation Price mapping
1498        $quotation_price_mapping = rgpost('sap_quotation_price_mapping');
1499        if (is_array($quotation_price_mapping)) {
1500            $settings['quotation_price_mapping'] = array();
1501            $allowed_quotation_fields = array_keys($this->get_sap_quotation_fields());
1502            
1503            foreach ($quotation_price_mapping as $quotation_field => $price) {
1504                if (in_array($quotation_field, $allowed_quotation_fields, true) && !empty($price)) {
1505                    // Validate that price is a valid positive number
1506                    $sanitized_price = floatval($price);
1507                    if ($sanitized_price >= 0) {
1508                        $settings['quotation_price_mapping'][$quotation_field] = $sanitized_price;
1509                    }
1510                }
1511            }
1512        }
1513        
1514        $form['sap_integration_settings'] = $settings;
1515        
1516        shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Form settings saved', array(
1517            'form_id' => $form['id'],
1518            'settings' => $settings
1519        ));
1520        
1521        return $form;
1522    }
1523
1524    /**
1525     * Process form submission
1526     *
1527     * Handles form submissions and sends data to SAP Business One.
1528     *
1529     * @since 1.0.0
1530     * @param array $entry Entry data
1531     * @param array $form  Form data
1532     */
1533    public function process_form_submission($entry, $form) {
1534        $settings = rgar($form, 'sap_integration_settings');
1535        
1536        // Initialize status tracking
1537        if (!empty($entry['id'])) {
1538            $this->update_entry_sap_status($entry['id'], 'processing', '', '');
1539        }
1540        
1541        if (empty($settings['enabled']) || $settings['enabled'] !== '1') {
1542            if (!empty($entry['id'])) {
1543                $this->update_entry_sap_status($entry['id'], 'skipped', '', 'SAP Integration not enabled for this form');
1544            }
1545            return;
1546        }
1547        
1548        try {
1549            // STEP 1: Validate SAP connection settings
1550            $plugin_settings = get_option('shift8_gravitysap_settings', array());
1551            if (empty($plugin_settings['sap_endpoint']) || empty($plugin_settings['sap_username']) || empty($plugin_settings['sap_password'])) {
1552                throw new Exception('SAP connection settings are incomplete - check plugin settings');
1553            }
1554            
1555            // STEP 2: Validate required fields BEFORE attempting SAP connection
1556            $validation_result = $this->validate_required_fields($settings, $entry, $form);
1557            if (!$validation_result['valid']) {
1558                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('❌ FIELD VALIDATION FAILED', array(
1559                    'entry_id' => $entry['id'],
1560                    'validation_error' => $validation_result['error'],
1561                    'field_mapping' => rgar($settings, 'field_mapping', array()),
1562                    'entry_data' => $entry
1563                ));
1564                throw new Exception('Field validation failed: ' . $validation_result['error']);
1565            }
1566            
1567            shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('✅ FIELD VALIDATION PASSED', array(
1568                'entry_id' => $entry['id'],
1569                'field_mapping' => rgar($settings, 'field_mapping', array())
1570            ));
1571            
1572            // STEP 3: Map form fields to SAP Business Partner data
1573            $business_partner_data = $this->map_entry_to_business_partner($settings, $entry, $form);
1574            
1575            shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('📋 MAPPED BUSINESS PARTNER DATA', array(
1576                'entry_id' => $entry['id'],
1577                'business_partner_data' => $business_partner_data
1578            ));
1579            
1580            // STEP 4: Validate field mapping
1581            $mapping_validation = $this->validate_field_mapping($settings, $entry, $form);
1582            shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Field mapping validation', $mapping_validation);
1583            
1584            // STEP 5: Initialize SAP service
1585            $plugin_settings['sap_password'] = shift8_gravitysap_decrypt_password($plugin_settings['sap_password']);
1586            require_once SHIFT8_GRAVITYSAP_PLUGIN_DIR . 'includes/class-shift8-gravitysap-sap-service.php';
1587            $sap_service = new Shift8_GravitySAP_SAP_Service($plugin_settings);
1588            
1589            // STEP 6: Create Business Partner in SAP
1590            $result = $sap_service->create_business_partner($business_partner_data);
1591            
1592            // STEP 7: Handle success
1593            if ($result && isset($result['CardCode'])) {
1594                $this->update_entry_sap_status($entry['id'], 'success', $result['CardCode'], '');
1595                
1596                // Add success note to entry
1597                GFFormsModel::add_note(
1598                    $entry['id'], 
1599                    0, 
1600                    'Shift8 SAP Integration', 
1601                    sprintf(
1602                        /* translators: %s: SAP Business Partner Card Code */
1603                        esc_html__('✅ SUCCESS: Business Partner created in SAP B1. Card Code: %s', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'), 
1604                        esc_html($result['CardCode'])
1605                    )
1606                );
1607                
1608                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('✅ SAP CONFIRMATION: Business Partner created successfully', array(
1609                    'CardCode' => $result['CardCode'],
1610                    'CardName' => $result['CardName'] ?? 'N/A',
1611                    'CardType' => $result['CardType'] ?? 'N/A',
1612                    'Series' => $result['Series'] ?? 'N/A',
1613                    'EntryID' => $entry['id'],
1614                    'FormID' => $form['id']
1615                ));
1616                
1617                // STEP 8: Create Sales Quotation if enabled
1618                if (!empty($settings['create_quotation']) && $settings['create_quotation'] === '1') {
1619                    try {
1620                        $quotation_result = $this->create_sales_quotation_from_entry($entry, $form, $settings, $result['CardCode'], $sap_service);
1621                        
1622                        if ($quotation_result && isset($quotation_result['DocEntry'])) {
1623                            // Update entry with quotation info
1624                            gform_update_meta($entry['id'], 'sap_b1_quotation_docentry', $quotation_result['DocEntry']);
1625                            gform_update_meta($entry['id'], 'sap_b1_quotation_docnum', $quotation_result['DocNum'] ?? '');
1626                            
1627                            // Add quotation note
1628                            GFFormsModel::add_note(
1629                                $entry['id'], 
1630                                0, 
1631                                'Shift8 SAP Integration', 
1632                                sprintf(
1633                                    /* translators: 1: DocNum, 2: DocEntry */
1634                                    esc_html__('✅ SUCCESS: Sales Quotation created in SAP B1. Doc #%1$s (Entry: %2$s)', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'), 
1635                                    esc_html($quotation_result['DocNum'] ?? 'N/A'),
1636                                    esc_html($quotation_result['DocEntry'])
1637                                )
1638                            );
1639                            
1640                            shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('✅ SAP QUOTATION: Sales Quotation created successfully', array(
1641                                'DocEntry' => $quotation_result['DocEntry'],
1642                                'DocNum' => $quotation_result['DocNum'] ?? 'N/A',
1643                                'CardCode' => $result['CardCode'],
1644                                'EntryID' => $entry['id']
1645                            ));
1646                        }
1647                    } catch (Exception $quotation_error) {
1648                        // Log quotation error but don't fail the whole submission
1649                        shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('⚠️ SAP QUOTATION FAILED (BP was created successfully)', array(
1650                            'error' => $quotation_error->getMessage(),
1651                            'CardCode' => $result['CardCode'],
1652                            'EntryID' => $entry['id']
1653                        ));
1654                        
1655                        GFFormsModel::add_note(
1656                            $entry['id'], 
1657                            0, 
1658                            'Shift8 SAP Integration', 
1659                            sprintf(
1660                                /* translators: %s: Error message */
1661                                esc_html__('⚠️ WARNING: Sales Quotation creation failed: %s (Business Partner was created successfully)', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'), 
1662                                esc_html($quotation_error->getMessage())
1663                            )
1664                        );
1665                    }
1666                }
1667            } else {
1668                throw new Exception('SAP returned success but no CardCode - check SAP logs');
1669            }
1670            
1671        } catch (Exception $e) {
1672            $error_message = $e->getMessage();
1673            $this->update_entry_sap_status($entry['id'], 'failed', '', $error_message);
1674            
1675            // Add detailed error note to entry
1676            GFFormsModel::add_note(
1677                $entry['id'], 
1678                0, 
1679                'Shift8 SAP Integration', 
1680                sprintf(
1681                    /* translators: %s: Error message */
1682                    esc_html__('❌ FAILED: %s', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'), 
1683                    esc_html($error_message)
1684                )
1685            );
1686            
1687            shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('❌ SAP SUBMISSION FAILED', array(
1688                'entry_id' => $entry['id'],
1689                'form_id' => $form['id'],
1690                'error' => $error_message,
1691                'entry_data' => $entry
1692            ));
1693        }
1694    }
1695
1696    /**
1697     * Update entry SAP status in database
1698     *
1699     * @since 1.1.0
1700     * @param int    $entry_id Entry ID
1701     * @param string $status   Status (processing, success, failed, skipped)
1702     * @param string $cardcode SAP CardCode if successful
1703     * @param string $error    Error message if failed
1704     */
1705    private function update_entry_sap_status($entry_id, $status, $cardcode = '', $error = '') {
1706        // Use Gravity Forms native meta functions for proper persistence
1707        gform_update_meta($entry_id, 'sap_b1_status', $status);
1708        
1709        // Update CardCode if provided
1710        if (!empty($cardcode)) {
1711            gform_update_meta($entry_id, 'sap_b1_cardcode', $cardcode);
1712        }
1713        
1714        // Update error if provided
1715        if (!empty($error)) {
1716            gform_update_meta($entry_id, 'sap_b1_error', $error);
1717        }
1718        
1719        shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('SAP Status Updated', array(
1720            'entry_id' => $entry_id,
1721            'status' => $status,
1722            'cardcode' => $cardcode,
1723            'error' => $error
1724        ));
1725    }
1726
1727    /**
1728     * Validate required fields before SAP submission
1729     *
1730     * @since 1.1.0
1731     * @param array $settings Form settings
1732     * @param array $entry    Entry data
1733     * @param array $form     Form data
1734     * @return array Validation result
1735     */
1736    private function validate_required_fields($settings, $entry, $form) {
1737        $field_mapping = rgar($settings, 'field_mapping', array());
1738        $errors = array();
1739        
1740        // Check if CardName is mapped and has a value
1741        if (empty($field_mapping['CardName'])) {
1742            $errors[] = 'CardName (Business Partner Name) field is not mapped';
1743        } else {
1744            $cardname_field_id = $field_mapping['CardName'];
1745            $cardname_value = rgar($entry, $cardname_field_id);
1746            
1747            if (empty($cardname_value)) {
1748                $field_label = $this->get_field_label($form, $cardname_field_id);
1749                $errors[] = "CardName (Business Partner Name) field '{$field_label}' is empty";
1750            }
1751        }
1752        
1753        // Check if EmailAddress is mapped and has a value
1754        if (empty($field_mapping['EmailAddress'])) {
1755            $errors[] = 'EmailAddress field is not mapped';
1756        } else {
1757            $email_field_id = $field_mapping['EmailAddress'];
1758            $email_value = rgar($entry, $email_field_id);
1759            
1760            if (empty($email_value)) {
1761                $field_label = $this->get_field_label($form, $email_field_id);
1762                $errors[] = "EmailAddress field '{$field_label}' is empty";
1763            } elseif (!is_email($email_value)) {
1764                $field_label = $this->get_field_label($form, $email_field_id);
1765                $errors[] = "EmailAddress field '{$field_label}' contains invalid email: {$email_value}";
1766            }
1767        }
1768        
1769        if (!empty($errors)) {
1770            return array(
1771                'valid' => false,
1772                'error' => implode('; ', $errors)
1773            );
1774        }
1775        
1776        return array('valid' => true);
1777    }
1778
1779    /**
1780     * Map entry data to Business Partner structure
1781     *
1782     * @since 1.0.0
1783     * @param array $settings Form settings
1784     * @param array $entry    Entry data
1785     * @param array $form     Form data
1786     * @return array Business Partner data structure
1787     */
1788    private function map_entry_to_business_partner($settings, $entry, $form) {
1789        $field_mapping = rgar($settings, 'field_mapping', array());
1790        $card_type = rgar($settings, 'card_type', 'cCustomer');
1791        $card_code_prefix = rgar($settings, 'card_code_prefix', '');
1792        
1793        $business_partner = array('CardType' => $card_type);
1794        
1795        // Add the prefix if specified
1796        if (!empty($card_code_prefix)) {
1797            $business_partner['CardCodePrefix'] = $card_code_prefix;
1798        }
1799
1800        // Handle composite CardName (FirstName + LastName)
1801        $first_name = '';
1802        $last_name = '';
1803        if (!empty($field_mapping['CardName_FirstName'])) {
1804            $first_name = rgar($entry, $field_mapping['CardName_FirstName']);
1805        }
1806        if (!empty($field_mapping['CardName_LastName'])) {
1807            $last_name = rgar($entry, $field_mapping['CardName_LastName']);
1808        }
1809        
1810        // If both first and last name are provided, combine them for CardName
1811        if (!empty($first_name) || !empty($last_name)) {
1812            $business_partner['CardName'] = trim(sanitize_text_field($first_name) . ' ' . sanitize_text_field($last_name));
1813        }
1814        
1815        // Track contact person data
1816        $contact_person_data = array();
1817        
1818        foreach ($field_mapping as $sap_field => $field_id) {
1819            // Skip composite fields as they're handled above
1820            if ($sap_field === 'CardName_FirstName' || $sap_field === 'CardName_LastName') {
1821                continue;
1822            }
1823            
1824            if (empty($field_id)) {
1825                continue;
1826            }
1827
1828            $field_value = rgar($entry, $field_id);
1829            
1830            if (empty($field_value)) {
1831                continue;
1832            }
1833
1834            // Sanitize field value
1835            $field_value = sanitize_text_field($field_value);
1836
1837            // Handle Contact Person fields
1838            if (strpos($sap_field, 'ContactEmployees.') === 0) {
1839                $contact_field = str_replace('ContactEmployees.', '', $sap_field);
1840                $contact_person_data[$contact_field] = $field_value;
1841            }
1842            // Handle address fields for BPAddresses collection
1843            elseif (strpos($sap_field, 'BPAddresses.') === 0) {
1844                $address_field = str_replace('BPAddresses.', '', $sap_field);
1845                
1846                if (!isset($business_partner['BPAddresses'])) {
1847                    $business_partner['BPAddresses'] = array(array('AddressType' => 'bo_BillTo'));
1848                }
1849                $business_partner['BPAddresses'][0][$address_field] = $field_value;
1850            }
1851            // Handle main Business Partner fields
1852            else {
1853                $business_partner[$sap_field] = $field_value;
1854            }
1855        }
1856        
1857        // Create Contact Person entry if we have contact data
1858        if (!empty($contact_person_data)) {
1859            $contact_person = array();
1860            
1861            // Set the contact name
1862            if (!empty($contact_person_data['FirstName']) || !empty($contact_person_data['LastName'])) {
1863                $contact_person['Name'] = trim(
1864                    ($contact_person_data['FirstName'] ?? '') . ' ' . 
1865                    ($contact_person_data['LastName'] ?? '')
1866                );
1867            } else {
1868                $contact_person['Name'] = $business_partner['CardName'] ?? 'Primary Contact';
1869            }
1870            
1871            // Add first/last name
1872            if (!empty($contact_person_data['FirstName'])) {
1873                $contact_person['FirstName'] = $contact_person_data['FirstName'];
1874            }
1875            if (!empty($contact_person_data['LastName'])) {
1876                $contact_person['LastName'] = $contact_person_data['LastName'];
1877            }
1878            
1879            // Add contact fields
1880            if (!empty($contact_person_data['E_Mail'])) {
1881                $contact_person['E_Mail'] = $contact_person_data['E_Mail'];
1882            }
1883            if (!empty($contact_person_data['Phone1'])) {
1884                $contact_person['Phone1'] = $contact_person_data['Phone1'];
1885            }
1886            if (!empty($contact_person_data['Address'])) {
1887                $contact_person['Address'] = $contact_person_data['Address'];
1888            }
1889            
1890            $business_partner['ContactEmployees'] = array($contact_person);
1891        }
1892
1893        return $business_partner;
1894    }
1895
1896    /**
1897     * Validate field mapping and provide detailed mapping information
1898     *
1899     * @since 1.1.0
1900     * @param array $settings Form settings
1901     * @param array $entry    Entry data
1902     * @param array $form     Form data
1903     * @return array Mapping validation results
1904     */
1905    private function validate_field_mapping($settings, $entry, $form) {
1906        $field_mapping = rgar($settings, 'field_mapping', array());
1907        $mapped_fields = array();
1908        $unmapped_fields = array();
1909        $empty_fields = array();
1910        $available_sap_fields = $this->get_sap_fields();
1911        
1912        // Check each mapped field
1913        foreach ($field_mapping as $sap_field => $field_id) {
1914            if (empty($field_id)) {
1915                $unmapped_fields[] = array(
1916                    'sap_field' => $sap_field,
1917                    'sap_label' => $available_sap_fields[$sap_field] ?? $sap_field,
1918                    'reason' => 'No Gravity Forms field mapped'
1919                );
1920                continue;
1921            }
1922            
1923            $field_value = rgar($entry, $field_id);
1924            $field_label = $this->get_field_label($form, $field_id);
1925            
1926            if (empty($field_value)) {
1927                $empty_fields[] = array(
1928                    'sap_field' => $sap_field,
1929                    'sap_label' => $available_sap_fields[$sap_field] ?? $sap_field,
1930                    'gf_field_id' => $field_id,
1931                    'gf_field_label' => $field_label,
1932                    'reason' => 'Field value is empty'
1933                );
1934            } else {
1935                $mapped_fields[] = array(
1936                    'sap_field' => $sap_field,
1937                    'sap_label' => $available_sap_fields[$sap_field] ?? $sap_field,
1938                    'gf_field_id' => $field_id,
1939                    'gf_field_label' => $field_label,
1940                    'value' => $field_value
1941                );
1942            }
1943        }
1944        
1945        // Check for unmapped SAP fields
1946        foreach ($available_sap_fields as $sap_field => $sap_label) {
1947            if (!isset($field_mapping[$sap_field]) || empty($field_mapping[$sap_field])) {
1948                $unmapped_fields[] = array(
1949                    'sap_field' => $sap_field,
1950                    'sap_label' => $sap_label,
1951                    'reason' => 'Not mapped to any Gravity Forms field'
1952                );
1953            }
1954        }
1955        
1956        return array(
1957            'mapped_fields' => $mapped_fields,
1958            'unmapped_fields' => $unmapped_fields,
1959            'empty_fields' => $empty_fields,
1960            'total_mapped' => count($mapped_fields),
1961            'total_unmapped' => count($unmapped_fields),
1962            'total_empty' => count($empty_fields)
1963        );
1964    }
1965    
1966    /**
1967     * Create Sales Quotation from entry data
1968     *
1969     * @since 1.2.2
1970     * @param array  $entry       Entry data
1971     * @param array  $form        Form data
1972     * @param array  $settings    Form settings
1973     * @param string $card_code   Business Partner CardCode
1974     * @param object $sap_service SAP Service instance
1975     * @return array Created quotation data
1976     * @throws Exception If creation fails
1977     */
1978    private function create_sales_quotation_from_entry($entry, $form, $settings, $card_code, $sap_service) {
1979        shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('=== STARTING SALES QUOTATION CREATION ===');
1980        
1981        $quotation_mapping = rgar($settings, 'quotation_field_mapping', array());
1982        
1983        if (empty($quotation_mapping)) {
1984            throw new Exception('No quotation field mapping configured');
1985        }
1986        
1987        // Initialize quotation data
1988        $quotation_data = array(
1989            'CardCode' => $card_code,
1990            'DocumentLines' => array()
1991        );
1992        
1993        // Add Comments if mapped
1994        if (!empty($quotation_mapping['Comments'])) {
1995            $comments_value = rgar($entry, $quotation_mapping['Comments']);
1996            if (!empty($comments_value)) {
1997                $quotation_data['Comments'] = $comments_value;
1998            }
1999        }
2000        
2001        // Collect line items dynamically
2002        $line_items = array();
2003        
2004        // Loop through all 20 potential item slots
2005        for ($i = 1; $i <= 20; $i++) {
2006            $item_code_key = "DocumentLines.{$i}.ItemCode";
2007            
2008            // Check if this slot has an ItemCode mapping
2009            if (empty($quotation_mapping[$item_code_key])) {
2010                continue; // Skip unmapped slots
2011            }
2012            
2013            // Get the form field ID that triggers this line item
2014            $form_field_id = rgar($quotation_mapping, $item_code_key);
2015            if (empty($form_field_id)) {
2016                continue; // No form field mapped
2017            }
2018            
2019            // Check if the form field has a value in the entry
2020            $field_value = rgar($entry, $form_field_id);
2021            if (empty($field_value)) {
2022                continue; // Form field is empty, skip this line item
2023            }
2024            
2025            // Get the SAP ItemCode for this slot
2026            $itemcode_mapping = rgar($settings, 'quotation_itemcode_mapping', array());
2027            $sap_item_code = rgar($itemcode_mapping, $item_code_key);
2028            if (empty($sap_item_code)) {
2029                continue; // No SAP ItemCode configured
2030            }
2031            
2032            // Check if custom price is set for this item
2033            $price_mapping = rgar($settings, 'quotation_price_mapping', array());
2034            $custom_price = rgar($price_mapping, $item_code_key);
2035            
2036            // We have both a form field value AND an ItemCode! Build the line item
2037            $line_item = array(
2038                'ItemCode' => $sap_item_code,
2039                'UoMEntry' => 1, // Default UoM entry (usually "Each")
2040                'Quantity' => 1.0, // Ensure quantity is always set as float
2041                'WarehouseCode' => '01', // Default warehouse (required for display)
2042                'LineType' => 'dlt_Regular', // Regular line type (required for display)
2043                'TreeType' => 'iProductionTree', // Force production tree type for UI visibility
2044                'VatGroup' => '' // Empty VAT group to match working items
2045            );
2046            
2047            // Add custom price if configured, otherwise let SAP auto-populate from item master
2048            if (!empty($custom_price) && is_numeric($custom_price) && floatval($custom_price) > 0) {
2049                $line_item['UnitPrice'] = floatval($custom_price);
2050            }
2051            // If no custom price set, SAP B1 will auto-populate UnitPrice from ItemCode master data
2052            
2053            // Add optional fields for this line item
2054            $optional_fields = array('ItemDescription', 'Quantity', 'UnitPrice', 'DiscountPercent', 'TaxCode');
2055            
2056            foreach ($optional_fields as $field_name) {
2057                $field_key = "DocumentLines.{$i}.{$field_name}";
2058                
2059                if (!empty($quotation_mapping[$field_key])) {
2060                    $field_value = rgar($entry, $quotation_mapping[$field_key]);
2061                    
2062                    if (!empty($field_value)) {
2063                        // Convert numeric fields
2064                        if (in_array($field_name, array('Quantity', 'UnitPrice', 'DiscountPercent'), true)) {
2065                            $field_value = floatval($field_value);
2066                        }
2067                        
2068                        $line_item[$field_name] = $field_value;
2069                    }
2070                }
2071            }
2072            
2073            // Ensure Quantity is always a float (SAP requirement)
2074            if (!isset($line_item['Quantity']) || !is_numeric($line_item['Quantity'])) {
2075                $line_item['Quantity'] = 1.0;
2076            } else {
2077                $line_item['Quantity'] = floatval($line_item['Quantity']);
2078            }
2079            
2080            // Log line item creation with pricing info
2081            $price_source = isset($line_item['UnitPrice']) ? 'Custom Price: ' . $line_item['UnitPrice'] : 'SAP Auto-Price';
2082            shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Line item created', array(
2083                'ItemCode' => $line_item['ItemCode'],
2084                'Quantity' => $line_item['Quantity'],
2085                'PriceSource' => $price_source,
2086                'FormField' => $item_code_key,
2087                'FormFieldValue' => $field_value
2088            ));
2089            
2090            $line_items[] = $line_item;
2091        }
2092        
2093        // Validate we have at least one line item
2094        if (empty($line_items)) {
2095            throw new Exception('No line items found for quotation (no Item Codes provided)');
2096        }
2097        
2098        $quotation_data['DocumentLines'] = $line_items;
2099        
2100        shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Sales Quotation data prepared', array(
2101            'CardCode' => $card_code,
2102            'LineItemCount' => count($line_items),
2103            'QuotationData' => $quotation_data
2104        ));
2105        
2106        // Create the quotation in SAP
2107        return $sap_service->create_sales_quotation($quotation_data);
2108    }
2109    
2110    /**
2111     * Get field label from form data
2112     *
2113     * @since 1.1.0
2114     * @param array $form     Form data
2115     * @param int   $field_id Field ID
2116     * @return string Field label
2117     */
2118    private function get_field_label($form, $field_id) {
2119        if (empty($form['fields']) || !is_array($form['fields'])) {
2120            return 'Field ' . $field_id;
2121        }
2122        
2123        foreach ($form['fields'] as $field) {
2124            if ($field['id'] == $field_id) {
2125                return $field['label'] ?? 'Field ' . $field_id;
2126            }
2127        }
2128        
2129        return 'Field ' . $field_id;
2130    }

2132    /**
2133     * Load SAP entry meta into entries array
2134     *
2135     * @since 1.1.0
2136     * @param array $entries Array of entries
2137     * @param array $form    Form object
2138     * @return array Entries with SAP meta loaded
2139     */
2140    public function load_sap_entry_meta($entries, $form) {
2141        if (empty($entries) || !is_array($entries)) {
2142            return $entries;
2143        }
2144        
2145        foreach ($entries as &$entry) {
2146            if (empty($entry['id'])) {
2147                continue;
2148            }
2149            
2150            // Load SAP meta using Gravity Forms native functions
2151            $status = gform_get_meta($entry['id'], 'sap_b1_status');
2152            if ($status) {
2153                $entry['sap_b1_status'] = $status;
2154            }
2155            
2156            $cardcode = gform_get_meta($entry['id'], 'sap_b1_cardcode');
2157            if ($cardcode) {
2158                $entry['sap_b1_cardcode'] = $cardcode;
2159            }
2160            
2161            $error = gform_get_meta($entry['id'], 'sap_b1_error');
2162            if ($error) {
2163                $entry['sap_b1_error'] = $error;
2164            }
2165        }
2166        
2167        return $entries;
2168    }
2169

2171     * Add SAP B1 Status column to entries list

2218

2238    
2239    /**
2240     * Get combined first and last name
2241     */
2242    private function get_combined_name($entry, $form) {
2243        $settings = rgar($form, 'sap_integration_settings', array());
2244        $field_mapping = rgar($settings, 'field_mapping', array());
2245        
2246        // Debug logging
2247        if (defined('WP_DEBUG') && WP_DEBUG) {
2248            error_log('DEBUG: get_combined_name - Field mapping: ' . print_r($field_mapping, true));
2249            error_log('DEBUG: get_combined_name - Entry data: ' . print_r($entry, true));
2250        }
2251        
2252        // Try to get CardName field first
2253        if (!empty($field_mapping['CardName'])) {
2254            $cardname_field_id = $field_mapping['CardName'];
2255            $cardname_value = rgar($entry, $cardname_field_id);
2256            
2257            if (defined('WP_DEBUG') && WP_DEBUG) {
2258                error_log('DEBUG: CardName field ID: ' . $cardname_field_id . ', Value: ' . $cardname_value);
2259            }
2260            
2261            if (!empty($cardname_value)) {
2262                return esc_html($cardname_value);
2263            }
2264        }
2265        
2266        // Method 1: Look for name fields and combine them
2267        $first_name = '';
2268        $last_name = '';
2269        
2270        foreach ($form['fields'] as $field) {
2271            if ($field->type === 'name') {
2272                // Try different sub-field patterns
2273                $field_id = $field->id;
2274                
2275                // Standard Gravity Forms name field sub-fields
2276                $first_name = rgar($entry, $field_id . '.3') ?: rgar($entry, $field_id . '_3') ?: rgar($entry, $field_id . '3');
2277                $last_name = rgar($entry, $field_id . '.6') ?: rgar($entry, $field_id . '_6') ?: rgar($entry, $field_id . '6');
2278                
2279                if (defined('WP_DEBUG') && WP_DEBUG) {
2280                    error_log('DEBUG: Name field ID ' . $field_id . ' - First: "' . $first_name . '", Last: "' . $last_name . '"');
2281                }
2282                
2283                if (!empty($first_name) || !empty($last_name)) {
2284                    break;
2285                }
2286            }
2287        }
2288        
2289        // Method 2: Look for separate first/last name fields
2290        if (empty($first_name) && empty($last_name)) {
2291            foreach ($form['fields'] as $field) {
2292                $field_label_lower = strtolower($field->label);
2293                $field_value = rgar($entry, $field->id);
2294                
2295                if (strpos($field_label_lower, 'first') !== false && strpos($field_label_lower, 'name') !== false && !empty($field_value)) {
2296                    $first_name = $field_value;
2297                    if (defined('WP_DEBUG') && WP_DEBUG) {
2298                        error_log('DEBUG: Found first name field: ' . $field->label . ' = ' . $field_value);
2299                    }
2300                }
2301                if (strpos($field_label_lower, 'last') !== false && strpos($field_label_lower, 'name') !== false && !empty($field_value)) {
2302                    $last_name = $field_value;
2303                    if (defined('WP_DEBUG') && WP_DEBUG) {
2304                        error_log('DEBUG: Found last name field: ' . $field->label . ' = ' . $field_value);
2305                    }
2306                }
2307            }
2308        }
2309        
2310        // Method 3: Look for any field with "name" in the label
2311        if (empty($first_name) && empty($last_name)) {
2312            foreach ($form['fields'] as $field) {
2313                $field_label_lower = strtolower($field->label);
2314                $field_value = rgar($entry, $field->id);
2315                
2316                if (strpos($field_label_lower, 'name') !== false && !empty($field_value)) {
2317                    if (defined('WP_DEBUG') && WP_DEBUG) {
2318                        error_log('DEBUG: Found name field by label: ' . $field->label . ' = ' . $field_value);
2319                    }
2320                    return esc_html($field_value);
2321                }
2322            }
2323        }
2324        
2325        // Combine first and last name
2326        $full_name = trim($first_name . ' ' . $last_name);
2327        
2328        if (defined('WP_DEBUG') && WP_DEBUG) {
2329            error_log('DEBUG: Final combined name: "' . $full_name . '"');
2330        }
2331        
2332        return !empty($full_name) ? esc_html($full_name) : '—';
2333    }

2409    /**
2410     * AJAX handler for retrying SAP submission
2411     *
2412     * @since 1.1.0
2413     */
2414    public function ajax_retry_sap_submission() {
2415        // Verify nonce
2416        if (!isset($_POST['nonce']) || !wp_verify_nonce(sanitize_text_field(wp_unslash($_POST['nonce'])), 'retry_sap_submission')) {
2417            wp_send_json_error('Invalid nonce');
2418        }
2419        
2420        // Check permissions
2421        if (!current_user_can('gform_full_access')) {
2422            wp_send_json_error('Insufficient permissions');
2423        }
2424        
2425        $entry_id = isset($_POST['entry_id']) ? intval($_POST['entry_id']) : 0;
2426        if (empty($entry_id)) {
2427            wp_send_json_error('Invalid entry ID');
2428        }
2429        
2430        try {
2431            // Get entry and form data
2432            $entry = GFAPI::get_entry($entry_id);
2433            if (is_wp_error($entry)) {
2434                wp_send_json_error('Entry not found');
2435            }
2436            
2437            $form = GFAPI::get_form($entry['form_id']);
2438            if (is_wp_error($form)) {
2439                wp_send_json_error('Form not found');
2440            }
2441            
2442            // Clear previous error status
2443            $this->update_entry_sap_status($entry_id, 'processing', '', '');
2444            
2445            // Retry the submission
2446            $this->process_form_submission($entry, $form);
2447            
2448            // Get updated status
2449            $updated_entry = GFAPI::get_entry($entry_id);
2450            $sap_status = rgar($updated_entry, 'sap_b1_status', '');
2451            $sap_cardcode = rgar($updated_entry, 'sap_b1_cardcode', '');
2452            $sap_error = rgar($updated_entry, 'sap_b1_error', '');
2453            
2454            if (!empty($sap_cardcode)) {
2455                wp_send_json_success(array(
2456                    'message' => 'Submission successful!',
2457                    'cardcode' => $sap_cardcode,
2458                    'status' => 'success'
2459                ));
2460            } elseif (!empty($sap_error)) {
2461                wp_send_json_error(array(
2462                    'message' => 'Submission failed: ' . $sap_error,
2463                    'error' => $sap_error,
2464                    'status' => 'failed'
2465                ));
2466            } else {
2467                wp_send_json_error(array(
2468                    'message' => 'Submission status unknown',
2469                    'status' => 'unknown'
2470                ));
2471            }
2472            
2473        } catch (Exception $e) {
2474            wp_send_json_error(array(
2475                'message' => 'Retry failed: ' . $e->getMessage(),
2476                'error' => $e->getMessage()
2477            ));
2478        }
2479    }

2481    /**
2482     * AJAX handler for loading ItemCodes from SAP B1
2483     *
2484     * @since 1.2.2
2485     */
2486    public function ajax_load_itemcodes() {
2487        // Add debugging
2488        error_log('AJAX ITEMCODE: Handler called');
2489        
2490        // Verify nonce
2491        $nonce = sanitize_text_field(wp_unslash($_POST['nonce'] ?? ''));
2492        if (!wp_verify_nonce($nonce, 'shift8_gravitysap_load_itemcodes')) {
2493            error_log('AJAX ITEMCODE: Nonce verification failed');
2494            wp_send_json_error(array('message' => 'Invalid nonce'));
2495            return;
2496        }
2497        
2498        // Check user capabilities
2499        if (!current_user_can('manage_options')) {
2500            error_log('AJAX ITEMCODE: Insufficient permissions');
2501            wp_send_json_error(array('message' => 'Insufficient permissions'));
2502            return;
2503        }
2504        
2505        error_log('AJAX ITEMCODE: Security checks passed');
2506        
2507        try {
2508            // Force refresh ItemCodes
2509            $force_refresh = isset($_POST['force_refresh']) && $_POST['force_refresh'] === 'true';
2510            
2511            // Clear persistent storage if forcing refresh
2512            if ($force_refresh) {
2513                delete_option('shift8_gravitysap_item_codes_data');
2514            }
2515            
2516            // Load ItemCodes using the existing method
2517            $items = $this->get_sap_item_codes();
2518            
2519            if (empty($items)) {
2520                wp_send_json_error(array(
2521                    'message' => 'No ItemCodes found. Please check your SAP B1 connection settings.'
2522                ));
2523                return;
2524            }
2525            
2526            // Get metadata about the stored data
2527            $stored_data = get_option('shift8_gravitysap_item_codes_data', array());
2528            $last_updated = !empty($stored_data['last_updated_formatted']) ? $stored_data['last_updated_formatted'] : 'Unknown';
2529            
2530            // Return success with ItemCodes and metadata
2531            error_log('AJAX ITEMCODE: Returning success with ' . count($items) . ' items');
2532            wp_send_json_success(array(
2533                'items' => $items,
2534                'count' => count($items),
2535                'last_updated' => $last_updated,
2536                'storage_type' => 'persistent',
2537                'message' => sprintf('Successfully loaded %d ItemCodes from SAP B1 (Last updated: %s)', count($items), $last_updated)
2538            ));
2539            
2540        } catch (Exception $e) {
2541            error_log('AJAX ITEMCODE: Exception - ' . $e->getMessage());
2542            wp_send_json_error(array(
2543                'message' => 'Failed to load ItemCodes: ' . $e->getMessage()
2544            ));
2545        }
2546    }

3061    /**

3064     * @since 1.0.0
3065     * @param array $test_values Raw test values
3066     * @return array Sanitized test values
3067     */
3068    private function sanitize_test_values($test_values) {
3069        if (!is_array($test_values)) {
3070            return array();
3071        }
3072        
3073        $sanitized = array();
3074        $allowed_fields = $this->get_allowed_sap_fields();
3075        
3076        foreach ($test_values as $field => $value) {
3077            if (in_array($field, $allowed_fields, true)) {
3078                if ($field === 'EmailAddress') {
3079                    $sanitized[$field] = sanitize_email($value);
3080                } else {
3081                    $sanitized[$field] = sanitize_text_field($value);
3082                }
3083            }
3084        }
3085        
3086        return $sanitized;
3087    }

3089    /**
3090     * Map test values to Business Partner structure
3091     *
3092     * @since 1.0.0
3093     * @param array $settings    Form settings
3094     * @param array $test_values Test values
3095     * @return array Business Partner data structure
3096     */
3097    private function map_test_values_to_business_partner($settings, $test_values) {
3098        $card_type = rgar($settings, 'card_type', 'cCustomer');
3099        
3100        $business_partner = array('CardType' => $card_type);
3101

3108            if (strpos($sap_field, 'BPAddresses.') === 0) {

3110                
3111                if (!isset($business_partner['BPAddresses'])) {
3112                    $business_partner['BPAddresses'] = array(array('AddressType' => 'bo_BillTo'));
3113                }
3114                
3115                $business_partner['BPAddresses'][0][$address_field] = $test_value;
3116            } else {
3117                $business_partner[$sap_field] = $test_value;
3118            }
3119        }
3120        
3121        return $business_partner;
3122    }

3183    /**
3184     * Validate SAP field limits for Gravity Forms
3185     *
3186     * This function is hooked into gform_validation to validate
3187     * form field values against SAP Business One field limits.
3188     *
3189     * @since 1.1.0
3190     * @param array $validation_result The current validation result
3191     * @return array The modified validation result
3192     */
3193    public function validate_sap_field_limits($validation_result) {
3194        shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('=== SAP FIELD VALIDATION STARTED ===');
3195        
3196        $form = $validation_result['form'];
3197        $form_id = rgar($form, 'id', 'unknown');
3198        shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Validating form', array('form_id' => $form_id));
3199        
3200        $settings = rgar($form, 'sap_integration_settings', array());
3201        
3202        // Skip validation if SAP integration is not enabled
3203        if (empty($settings['enabled']) || $settings['enabled'] !== '1') {
3204            shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('SAP integration disabled for this form, skipping validation');
3205            return $validation_result;
3206        }
3207        
3208        $field_mapping = rgar($settings, 'field_mapping', array());
3209        if (empty($field_mapping)) {
3210            shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('No field mapping configured, skipping validation');
3211            return $validation_result;
3212        }
3213
3214        shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Field mapping found', array('mapping' => $field_mapping));
3215
3216        $sap_field_limits = $this->get_sap_field_limits();
3217        $validation_errors = 0;
3218
3219        foreach ($field_mapping as $sap_field => $field_id) {
3220            if (!isset($sap_field_limits[$sap_field])) {
3221                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('No limits defined for SAP field', array('sap_field' => $sap_field));
3222                continue;
3223            }
3224            
3225            $field = RGFormsModel::get_field($form, $field_id);
3226            if (!$field) {
3227                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Could not find form field', array('field_id' => $field_id));
3228                continue;
3229            }
3230            
3231            // Get field label early for consistent use throughout validation
3232            $field_label = GFCommon::get_label($field);
3233            
3234            // Debug field type and input structure
3235            shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Field details', array(
3236                'field_id' => $field_id,
3237                'field_type' => $field->type,
3238                'field_label' => $field_label
3239            ));
3240            
3241            $field_value = rgpost("input_{$field_id}");
3242            
3243            // For composite fields (name, address), try to get the value differently
3244            if (empty($field_value) && in_array($field->type, array('name', 'address'), true)) {
3245                // Try to get the complete value for name fields
3246                if ($field->type === 'name') {
3247                    $first = rgpost("input_{$field_id}.3");  // First name
3248                    $last = rgpost("input_{$field_id}.6");   // Last name
3249                    if (!empty($first) || !empty($last)) {
3250                        $field_value = trim($first . ' ' . $last);
3251                    }
3252                }
3253                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Composite field value retrieved', array(
3254                    'field_id' => $field_id,
3255                    'composite_value' => $field_value,
3256                    'first_name' => rgpost("input_{$field_id}.3"),
3257                    'last_name' => rgpost("input_{$field_id}.6")
3258                ));
3259            }
3260            
3261            // Allow theme functions to provide field values during validation
3262            // This is useful for fields that are populated by gform_pre_submission hooks
3263            if (empty($field_value)) {
3264                /**
3265                 * Filter: shift8_gravitysap_get_field_value_for_validation
3266                 * 
3267                 * Allows theme functions to provide field values during validation
3268                 * for fields that might be populated later in the form submission process.
3269                 * 
3270                 * @param string $field_value Current field value (empty)
3271                 * @param int    $field_id    Gravity Forms field ID
3272                 * @param object $field       Gravity Forms field object
3273                 * @param array  $form        Gravity Forms form array
3274                 * @param string $sap_field   SAP field name this is mapped to
3275                 */
3276                $field_value = apply_filters(
3277                    'shift8_gravitysap_get_field_value_for_validation',
3278                    $field_value,
3279                    $field_id,
3280                    $field,
3281                    $form,
3282                    $sap_field
3283                );
3284                
3285                if (!empty($field_value)) {
3286                    shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Field value provided by theme filter', array(
3287                        'field_id' => $field_id,
3288                        'field_label' => $field_label,
3289                        'provided_value' => $field_value,
3290                        'sap_field' => $sap_field
3291                    ));
3292                }
3293            }
3294            
3295            // For hidden or calculated fields that are still empty after all attempts,
3296            // skip validation if they're likely to be populated by theme functions
3297            if (empty($field_value)) {
3298                if ($field->type === 'hidden' || (isset($field->visibility) && $field->visibility === 'hidden')) {
3299                    shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Skipping validation for hidden field (likely populated by theme function)', array(

3301                        'field_type' => $field->type,

3303                        'sap_field' => $sap_field
3304                    ));
3305                    continue; // Skip validation for hidden fields that might be populated later
3306                }
3307            }
3308            
3309            // Debug all input_XX values for this field
3310            $all_inputs = array();
3311            foreach ($_POST as $key => $value) {
3312                if (strpos($key, "input_{$field_id}") === 0) {
3313                    $all_inputs[$key] = $value;
3314                }
3315            }

3317            $limits = $sap_field_limits[$sap_field];
3318

3330            if ($limits['required'] && empty($field_value)) {
3331                $validation_result['is_valid'] = false;
3332                $field->failed_validation = true;
3333                $field->validation_message = sprintf(

3337                $validation_errors++;
3338                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Required field validation failed', array('field' => $field_label));
3339                continue;
3340            }
3341
3342            // Skip validation if field is empty and not required
3343            if (empty($field_value)) {
3344                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Field is empty but not required, skipping');
3345                continue;

3348            // Check field length limits
3349            $field_length = strlen($field_value);
3350            $max_length = $limits['max_length'];
3351
3352            if ($field_length > $max_length) {
3353                $validation_result['is_valid'] = false;
3354                $field->failed_validation = true;
3355                
3356                $custom_message = isset($limits['validation_message']) ? $limits['validation_message'] : '';
3357                if ($custom_message) {

3366                    $field->validation_message = sprintf(
3367                        esc_html__('%s cannot exceed %d characters (currently %d characters).', 'shift8-gravity-forms-sap-b1-integration'),

3369                        $max_length,
3370                        $field_length
3371                    );
3372                }
3373                $validation_errors++;
3374                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Length validation failed', array(
3375                    'field' => $field_label,
3376                    'current_length' => $field_length,
3377                    'max_length' => $max_length
3378                ));
3379                continue;
3380            }
3381
3382            // Check email format
3383            if (isset($limits['format']) && $limits['format'] === 'email' && !is_email($field_value)) {

3385                $field->failed_validation = true;

3391                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Email validation failed', array('field' => $field_label, 'value' => $field_value));
3392                continue;
3393            }
3394
3395            // Check URL format
3396            if (isset($limits['format']) && $limits['format'] === 'url' && !filter_var($field_value, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL)) {
3397                $validation_result['is_valid'] = false;
3398                $field->failed_validation = true;
3399                $field->validation_message = sprintf(

3404                shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('URL validation failed', array('field' => $field_label, 'value' => $field_value));
3405                continue;
3406            }
3407            
3408            shift8_gravitysap_debug_log('Field validation passed', array('field' => $field_label));

3416        return $validation_result;
